definition: assemblage of talented individuals/ensemble of heroes
United Kingdom/British/England/English/abbr. for 英國|英国[Ying1 guo2]

sentences.english: Threshold inside, bunch English Fen Fang.
Now many students become crazy about collecting cards of heroes of the Three Kingdoms in my school.
sentences.chinese: 现在我们学校的许多学生疯狂收集三国群英卡。

sentences.english: Special thanks to Xin Qunying Opera Troupe allowing photo-taking at the backstage.
sentences.chinese: 特别鸣谢新群英剧团容许在后台拍照。

sentences.english: And this assembly today shall be known as the Congregation of the Heroes.
It is the only way to train undergraduates' scientific management ability.
sentences.chinese: 大学生科学管理能力培养必须走“兵团群英”之路。

definition: outstanding heroes/warlords vying for supremacy (in former times)/stars (of sports or pop music)
to pursue deer/fig. to vie for supremacy
beauty contest/vying to be the most beautiful
outstanding talent/wise and able person/illustrious individual
lit. hidden dragon, crouching tiger (idiom)/fig. talented individuals in hiding/concealed talent
lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
